name: cci-pingu
description: Periodically check for new builds (artifacts) on CircleCI and install them in turn
author: Roman Kaspar <roman@salsitasoft.com>

scripts.babel: babel lib --out-dir dist/lib --source-maps inline && babel cci-pingu.js --out-dir dist --source-maps inline
scripts.build: npm run gen-ver && npm run lint && rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && npm run babel && npm run test
